title: Geth stuck on block 15090000 - BAD BLOCK
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `geth version`
```
Geth
Version: 1.10.20-stable
Architecture: arm64
Go Version: go1.18.3
Operating System: darwin
GOPATH=
GOROOT=go
```
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
```
macOS 12.4
```
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

#### Expected behaviour

Able to process blocks

#### Actual behaviour

Keep getting `BAD BLOCK` at block number `15090000`

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Run geth

#### Logs

````
WARN [07-06|11:49:46.608] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=6ec026127f95704c40a1a8bf7ffc970de4382cf302dfabf6aa456f900347ef0d err="empty header set by peer"
INFO [07-06|11:49:53.837] Looking for peers                        peercount=0 tried=29 static=0
INFO [07-06|11:50:04.012] Looking for peers                        peercount=0 tried=26 static=0
INFO [07-06|11:50:14.018] Looking for peers                        peercount=0 tried=28 static=0
WARN [07-06|11:50:21.608] Empty head header set                    peer=6ec02612
WARN [07-06|11:50:21.608] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=6ec026127f95704c40a1a8bf7ffc970de4382cf302dfabf6aa456f900347ef0d err="empty header set by peer"
INFO [07-06|11:50:24.034] Looking for peers                        peercount=0 tried=34 static=0
INFO [07-06|11:50:34.351] Looking for peers                        peercount=0 tried=34 static=0
INFO [07-06|11:50:44.676] Looking for peers                        peercount=0 tried=35 static=0
INFO [07-06|11:50:55.202] Looking for peers                        peercount=2 tried=34 static=0
WARN [07-06|11:50:56.708] Empty head header set                    peer=6ec02612
WARN [07-06|11:50:56.708] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=6ec026127f95704c40a1a8bf7ffc970de4382cf302dfabf6aa456f900347ef0d err="empty header set by peer"
INFO [07-06|11:51:05.265] Looking for peers                        peercount=1 tried=34 static=0
INFO [07-06|11:51:12.860] Downloader queue stats                   receiptTasks=0 blockTasks=370 itemSize=18.09KiB throttle=8192
INFO [07-06|11:51:13.589] Skip duplicated bad block                number=15,090,000 hash=3adb58..cdd527
ERROR[07-06|11:51:13.589]
########## BAD BLOCK #########
Chain config: Chain ID:  1 (mainnet)
Consensus: Ethash (proof-of-work)

Pre-Merge hard forks:
 - Homestead:                   1150000  (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/homestead.md)
 - DAO Fork:                    1920000  (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/dao-fork.md)
 - Tangerine Whistle (EIP 150): 2463000  (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/tangerine-whistle.md)
 - Spurious Dragon/1 (EIP 155): 2675000  (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/spurious-dragon.md)
 - Spurious Dragon/2 (EIP 158): 2675000  (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/spurious-dragon.md)
 - Byzantium:                   4370000  (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/byzantium.md)
 - Constantinople:              7280000  (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/constantinople.md)
 - Petersburg:                  7280000  (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/petersburg.md)
 - Istanbul:                    9069000  (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/istanbul.md)
 - Muir Glacier:                9200000  (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/muir-glacier.md)
 - Berlin:                      12244000 (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/berlin.md)
 - London:                      12965000 (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/london.md)
 - Arrow Glacier:               13773000 (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/arrow-glacier.md)
 - Gray Glacier:                15050000 (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/gray-glacier.md)

Merge not configured!
 - Hard-fork specification: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/paris.md)

Number: 15090000
Hash: 0x3adb58b249ef88687cb7f6645e87a26b8a2f8088d1509e29bac91407c9cdd527


Error: invalid mix digest
##############################

WARN [07-06|11:51:13.589] Synchronisation failed, dropping peer    peer=8490e1b31cdb0b65e0a87b1c41ce98109fe100d68877ae72fd7f8ebc6bcb6f38 err="retrieved hash chain is invalid: invalid mix digest"
INFO [07-06|11:51:15.350] Looking for peers                        peercount=0 tried=37 static=0
````
You need to update to the newest version, there was a hardfork at 15090000 https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/06/16/gray-glacier-announcement/

@MariusVanDerWijden I am on Geth version `1.10.20-stable` and the article you linked says `Camaron (v1.10.19)`, so I believe I am up to date

Also note that I updated this morning after seeing it having this issue on 1.10.19

<details>
<summary>
full logs from boot to fail below (after running `brew install ethereum` and ending up on `1.10.20`):

The bad block you saw is indeed invalid, but geth should just continue syncing.
Oh, I see you resolved it in #25262
